long-reach.description: A move used by this Pokémon will not make contact.

liquid-voice.name: liquid-voice
liquid-voice.description: When this Pokémon uses a move that is sound-based, that move's type is Water.

triage.name: triage
triage.flavorText: Gives priority to the Pokémon's healing moves.
triage.description: This Pokémon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.

galvanize.name: galvanize
galvanize.flavorText: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
galvanize.description: When this Pokémon uses a Normal moves, that move is Electric its power is 1.2×.

surge-surfer.name: surge-surfer
surge-surfer.flavorText: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.
surge-surfer.description: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed on Electric Terrain.

schooling.name: schooling
schooling.flavorText:
When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a
powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP
is low.
schooling.description:
If this Pokémon is a wishiwashi and level 20 or above, then when it enters battle and at the start of each turn, it becomes Schooling Form if its HP is 25% or higher and Solo Form otherwise.

This ability cannot be replaced, copied, or nullified.

disguise.name: disguise
disguise.flavorText: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.
disguise.description:
If this Pokémon is in its Disguised Form and takes damage from a move, it switches to its Busted Form and the damage is prevented.  Other effects are not prevented.

This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Mimikyu.

battle-bond.name: battle-bond
battle-bond.flavorText: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, its bond with its Trainer is strengthened, and its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats are boosted.
battle-bond.description:
Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.

This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Greninja.

power-construct.name: power-construct
power-construct.flavorText:
Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes
half or less. Then the Pokémon changes
its form to Complete Forme.
power-construct.description:
Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.

This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Zygarde.

corrosion.name: corrosion
corrosion.flavorText: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.
corrosion.description: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.

comatose.name: comatose
comatose.flavorText: The Pokémon is always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack while in its sleeping state.
comatose.description: This Pokémon always acts as though it were Asleep.  It cannot be given another status ailment; it's unaffected by yawn; it can use sleep talk; and so on.

queenly-majesty.name: queenly-majesty
queenly-majesty.flavorText: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.
queenly-majesty.description: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.

innards-out.name: innards-out
innards-out.flavorText:
Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit
by the amount equal to its last HP.
innards-out.description: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

dancer.name: dancer
dancer.flavorText: Whenever a dance move is used in battle, the Pokémon will copy the user to immediately perform that dance move itself.
dancer.description: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.

battery.name: battery
battery.flavorText: Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves.
battery.description: Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3×.

fluffy.name: fluffy
fluffy.flavorText: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
fluffy.description: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.

dazzling.name: dazzling
dazzling.flavorText: The Pokémon dazzles its opponents, making them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.
dazzling.description: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.

soul-heart.name: soul-heart
soul-heart.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat every time another Pokémon faints.
soul-heart.description: This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.

tangling-hair.name: tangling-hair
tangling-hair.flavorText: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
tangling-hair.description: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

receiver.name: receiver
receiver.flavorText: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
receiver.description: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.

power-of-alchemy.name: power-of-alchemy
power-of-alchemy.flavorText: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
power-of-alchemy.description: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.

beast-boost.name: beast-boost
beast-boost.flavorText:
The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each
time it knocks out a Pokémon.
beast-boost.description: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.

rks-system.name: rks-system
rks-system.flavorText:
Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the
memory disc it holds.
rks-system.description:
Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.

This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified.  This ability only takes effect for Silvally.

electric-surge.name: electric-surge
electric-surge.flavorText: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
electric-surge.description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to electric terrain.

psychic-surge.name: psychic-surge
psychic-surge.flavorText: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
psychic-surge.description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to psychic terrain.

misty-surge.name: misty-surge
misty-surge.flavorText: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
misty-surge.description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to misty terrain.

grassy-surge.name: grassy-surge
grassy-surge.flavorText: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
grassy-surge.description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to grassy terrain.

full-metal-body.name: full-metal-body
full-metal-body.flavorText:
Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from
lowering the Pokémon’s stats.
full-metal-body.description:
This Pokémon's stats cannot be lowered by other Pokémon's moves or abilities.  This effect only applies to normal stat modifications and not more exotic effects such as topsy turvy or power swap.

This Ability is not bypassed by mold breaker, teravolt, or turboblaze.

shadow-shield.name: shadow-shield
shadow-shield.flavorText:
Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes
while its HP is full.
shadow-shield.description:
When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage (not fixed damage!) from moves is halved.

This ability cannot be nullified.

prism-armor.name: prism-armor
prism-armor.flavorText: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
prism-armor.description:
Super-effective damage this Pokémon takes is reduced to 0.75×.

This Ability is not bypassed by mold breaker, teravolt, or turboblaze.

neuroforce.name: neuroforce
neuroforce.flavorText: Powers up moves that are super effective.

intrepid-sword.name: intrepid-sword
intrepid-sword.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.

dauntless-shield.name: dauntless-shield
dauntless-shield.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.

libero.name: libero
libero.flavorText: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

ball-fetch.name: ball-fetch
ball-fetch.flavorText:
If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch
the Poké Ball from the first failed throw
of the battle.

cotton-down.name: cotton-down
cotton-down.flavorText:
When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters
cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stat of
all Pokémon except itself.

propeller-tail.name: propeller-tail
propeller-tail.flavorText: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

mirror-armor.name: mirror-armor
mirror-armor.flavorText: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

gulp-missile.name: gulp-missile
gulp-missile.flavorText:
When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back
with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey
to attack.

stalwart.name: stalwart
stalwart.flavorText: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

steam-engine.name: steam-engine
steam-engine.flavorText: Boosts the Speed stat drastically when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

punk-rock.name: punk-rock
punk-rock.flavorText: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

sand-spit.name: sand-spit
sand-spit.flavorText: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.

ice-scales.name: ice-scales
ice-scales.flavorText: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

ripen.name: ripen
ripen.flavorText: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

ice-face.name: ice-face
ice-face.flavorText: The Pokémon's ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon's appearance. The ice will be restored when it snows.

power-spot.name: power-spot
power-spot.flavorText: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

mimicry.name: mimicry
mimicry.flavorText: Changes the Pokémon’s type depending on the terrain.

screen-cleaner.name: screen-cleaner
screen-cleaner.flavorText:
When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of
Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for
both opposing and ally Pokémon.

steely-spirit.name: steely-spirit
steely-spirit.flavorText: Powers up the Steel-type moves of the Pokémon and its allies.

perish-body.name: perish-body
perish-body.flavorText:
When hit by a move that makes direct contact,
the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns
unless they switch out of battle.

wandering-spirit.name: wandering-spirit
wandering-spirit.flavorText:
The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon
that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

gorilla-tactics.name: gorilla-tactics
gorilla-tactics.flavorText:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat but only allows
the use of the first selected move.

neutralizing-gas.name: neutralizing-gas
neutralizing-gas.flavorText: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

pastel-veil.name: pastel-veil
pastel-veil.flavorText:
Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from
being poisoned.

hunger-switch.name: hunger-switch
hunger-switch.flavorText: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of every turn.

quick-draw.name: quick-draw
quick-draw.flavorText: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

unseen-fist.name: unseen-fist
unseen-fist.flavorText: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

curious-medicine.name: curious-medicine
curious-medicine.flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

chilling-neigh.name: chilling-neigh
chilling-neigh.flavorText: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

grim-neigh.name: grim-neigh
grim-neigh.flavorText: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

as-one-glastrier.name: as-one-glastrier
as-one-glastrier.flavorText: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Glastrier's Chilling Neigh Ability.

as-one-spectrier.name: as-one-spectrier
as-one-spectrier.flavorText: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Spectrier's Grim Neigh Ability.

lingering-aroma.name: lingering-aroma
lingering-aroma.flavorText: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

seed-sower.name: seed-sower
seed-sower.flavorText: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

thermal-exchange.name: thermal-exchange
thermal-exchange.flavorText: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.

anger-shell.name: anger-shell
anger-shell.flavorText: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

purifying-salt.name: purifying-salt
purifying-salt.flavorText: The Pokémon's pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.

well-baked-body.name: well-baked-body
well-baked-body.flavorText: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.

wind-rider.name: wind-rider
wind-rider.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.

guard-dog.name: guard-dog
guard-dog.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

wind-power.name: wind-power
wind-power.flavorText: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

zero-to-hero.name: zero-to-hero
zero-to-hero.flavorText: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.

commander.name: commander
commander.flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.

electromorphosis.name: electromorphosis
electromorphosis.flavorText: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

protosynthesis.name: protosynthesis
protosynthesis.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

quark-drive.name: quark-drive
quark-drive.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

good-as-gold.name: good-as-gold
good-as-gold.flavorText: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon's status moves.

vessel-of-ruin.name: vessel-of-ruin
vessel-of-ruin.flavorText: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.

sword-of-ruin.name: sword-of-ruin
sword-of-ruin.flavorText: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.

tablets-of-ruin.name: tablets-of-ruin
tablets-of-ruin.flavorText: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.

beads-of-ruin.name: beads-of-ruin
beads-of-ruin.flavorText: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.

orichalcum-pulse.name: orichalcum-pulse
orichalcum-pulse.flavorText: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.

hadron-engine.name: hadron-engine
hadron-engine.flavorText: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.

opportunist.name: opportunist
opportunist.flavorText: If an opponent's stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.

cud-chew.name: cud-chew
cud-chew.flavorText: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

supreme-overlord.name: supreme-overlord
supreme-overlord.flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.

costar.name: costar
costar.flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.

toxic-debris.name: toxic-debris
toxic-debris.flavorText: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

armor-tail.name: armor-tail
armor-tail.flavorText: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon's head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

earth-eater.name: earth-eater
earth-eater.flavorText: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

mycelium-might.name: mycelium-might
mycelium-might.flavorText: The Pokémon will always act more slowly when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

minds-eye.name: minds-eye
minds-eye.flavorText: The Pokémon ignores changes to opponents' evasiveness, its accuracy can't be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal-type and Fighting-type moves

supersweet-syrup.name: supersweet-syrup
supersweet-syrup.flavorText: Lowers the evasion of opposing Pokémon by 1 stage when first sent into battle

hospitality.name: hospitality
hospitality.flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring a small amount of the ally's HP

toxic-chain.name: toxic-chain
toxic-chain.flavorText: The power of the Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokémon hits with a move

embody-aspect.name: embody-aspect
embody-aspect.flavorText: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Mask to shine and one of the Pokémon's stats to be boosted.

tera-shift.name: tera-shift
tera-shift.flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it absorbs the energy around itself and transforms into its Terastal Form.

tera-shell.name: tera-shell
tera-shell.flavorText: The Pokémon's shell contains the powers of each type. All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.

teraform-zero.name: teraform-zero
teraform-zero.flavorText: When Terapagos changes into its Stellar Form, it uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.

poison-puppeteer.name: poison-puppeteer
poison-puppeteer.flavorText: Pokémon poisoned by Pecharunt's moves will also become confused.
